mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select su.user_id, su.realname, sd.name as deptName, group_concat(sr.role_name separator ',') as roleName from sys_user su left join sys_dept sd on su.dept_id = sd.dept_id left join sys_user_role sur on su.user_id = sur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id
and su.realname like concat('%',#{realname},'%')
and sd.dept_id = #{deptId}
and su.user_id not in (select user_id from t_atten_rule_user)
group by su.realname, sd.name

SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u, sys_user_role ur WHERE u.user_id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id IN
#{id}
